entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or rain. Temperature falling to minus 13 this morning then steady.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 13 this morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
